00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINTIONS*************************/
00038 /* Uncomment to chose current using eval board */
00039 //#define MCB_LPC_1768
00040 #define IAR_LPC_1768
00041 
00042 /* CONTROL register controls the privileged level for software execution
00043  * when the processor is in Thread mode
00044  */
00045 #define THREAD_PRIVILEGED                       0
00046 #define THREAD_UNPRIVILEGED                     1
00047 #define THREAD_PRIVILEDGED_MASK         0xFFFFFFFE
00048 
00049 /* Used LED */
00050 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00051 #define PRIVILEGE_LED                           28 //LED P1.28
00052 #define PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT                       1
00053 #define UNPRIVILEGE_LED                         29 //LED P1.29
00054 #define UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT                     1
00055 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00056 #define PRIVILEGE_LED                           25 //LED1: P1.25
00057 #define PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT                       1
00058 #define UNPRIVILEGE_LED                         4       //LED2: P0.4
00059 #define UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT                     0
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00063 uint8_t menu[]=
00064         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00065         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00066         "Privileged demo \n\r"
00067         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00068         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00069         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00070         "This example used to test Privileged feature of Cortex-M3 processor\n\r"
00071         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00072 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00073 uint8_t menu2[]=
00074         "LED1 (P1.28) will be turned on in privilege mode \n\r"
00075         "LED2 (P1.29) will be turned on in un-privilege mode\n\r";
00076 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00077 uint8_t menu2[]=
00078         "LED1 (P1.25) will be turned on in privilege mode \n\r"
00079         "LED2 (P0.4) will blink in un-privilege mode\n\r";
00080 #endif

00082 /************************** SYSTEM CALL EXCEPTION *********************/
00083 #if defined ( __CC_ARM   )
00084 __ASM void __SVC(void)
00085 {
00086   SVC 0x01
00087   BX R14
00088 }
00089 #elif defined ( __ICCARM__ )
00090 static __INLINE  void __SVC()                     { __ASM ("svc 0x01");}
00091 #elif defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00092 static __INLINE void __SVC()                      { __ASM volatile ("svc 0x01");}
00093 #endif
00094 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00095 /*********************************************************************/
00100 void SVC_Handler(void)
00101 {
00102   /* Change Thread mode to privileged */
00103   __set_CONTROL(2);
00104 }
00105 
00106 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00107 void LED_Init(void);
00108 void Turn_on_LED(uint8_t Led_num);
00109 void Turn_off_LED(uint8_t Led_num);
00110 
00111 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00112 /*********************************************************************/
00117 void LED_Init(void)
00118 {
00119         //setting two LEDs as output and turn off all
00120         GPIO_SetDir(PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED),1);
00121         GPIO_SetDir(UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED),1);
00122 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00123         GPIO_ClearValue(1,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED)|(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED));
00124         GPIO_ClearValue(2,(1<<2)|(1<<3)|(1<<4)|(1<<5)|(1<<6));
00125 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00126         GPIO_SetValue(PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED));
00127         GPIO_SetValue(UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED));
00128 #endif
00129 }
00130 
00131 /*********************************************************************/
00138 void Turn_on_LED(uint8_t Led_num)
00139 {
00140 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00141         if(Led_num == PRIVILEGE_LED){
00142                 GPIO_SetValue(PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED));}
00143         else{
00144                 GPIO_SetValue(UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED));
00145         }
00146 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00147         if(Led_num == PRIVILEGE_LED){
00148                 GPIO_ClearValue(PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED));}
00149         else{
00150                 GPIO_ClearValue(UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED));
00151         }
00152 #endif
00153 }
00154 
00155 /*********************************************************************/
00162 void Turn_off_LED(uint8_t Led_num)
00163 {
00164 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00165         if(Led_num == PRIVILEGE_LED){
00166                 GPIO_ClearValue(PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED));}
00167         else{
00168                 GPIO_ClearValue(UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED));
00169         }
00170 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00171         if(Led_num == PRIVILEGE_LED){
00172                 GPIO_SetValue(PRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<PRIVILEGE_LED));}
00173         else{
00174                 GPIO_SetValue(UNPRIVILEGE_LEDPORT,(1<<UNPRIVILEGE_LED));
00175         }
00176 #endif
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00180 /*********************************************************************/
00185 int c_entry(void)                       /* Main Program */
00186 {
00187         uint32_t priviledge_status;
00188         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00189          * – 115200bps
00190          * – 8 data bit
00191          * – No parity
00192          * – 1 stop bit
00193          * – No flow control
00194          */
00195         debug_frmwrk_init();
00196         LED_Init();
00197         //print menu
00198         _DBG(menu);
00199         _DBG_(menu2);
00200 
00201         /* Thread mode is privilege out of reset */
00202         /* First checking Thread mode is privilege or un-privilege */
00203         priviledge_status = __get_CONTROL();
00204         if((priviledge_status & (~THREAD_PRIVILEDGED_MASK))==THREAD_PRIVILEGED)
00205         {
00206                 _DBG_("Thread mode is privileged!");
00207                 Turn_on_LED(PRIVILEGE_LED);
00208         }
00209         else
00210         {
00211                 _DBG_("Theard mode is unprivileged! It's not compliant with Cortex-M3 Technical");
00212                 while(1); //Error loop
00213         }
00214         /* Wait user press '1' character to change to un-privilege mode */
00215         _DBG_("Press '1' to change to unprivilege mode ...\n\r");
00216         while(_DG !='1');
00217 
00218         /* Changing to un-privilege mode */
00219         __set_CONTROL((priviledge_status & THREAD_PRIVILEDGED_MASK)|THREAD_UNPRIVILEGED);
00220         _DBG_("Changed to unprivilege mode!");
00221 
00222         /* Check */
00223         priviledge_status = __get_CONTROL();
00224         if((priviledge_status & ~THREAD_PRIVILEDGED_MASK)==THREAD_UNPRIVILEGED)
00225         {
00226                 _DBG_("Check: Thread mode change to unprivilege successful!");
00227                 Turn_off_LED(PRIVILEGE_LED);
00228                 Turn_on_LED(UNPRIVILEGE_LED);
00229         }
00230         else
00231         {
00232                 _DBG_("Check: Thread mode is still privileged! ERROR...");
00233                 while(1); //Error loop
00234         }
00235         /* Wait user press '1' character to change to un-privilege mode */
00236         _DBG_("Press '2' to change to privilege mode by calling system call exception...\n\r");
00237         while(_DG !='2');
00238         /* Call system call exception to re-change Thread mode into privilege */
00239         __SVC();
00240         _DBG_("Called system call exception!");
00241 
00242         /* Check */
00243         priviledge_status = __get_CONTROL();
00244         if((priviledge_status & ~THREAD_PRIVILEDGED_MASK)==THREAD_PRIVILEGED)
00245         {
00246                 _DBG_("Check: Thread mode change to privilege successful!");
00247                 Turn_off_LED(UNPRIVILEGE_LED);
00248                 Turn_on_LED(PRIVILEGE_LED);
00249         }
00250         else
00251         {
00252                 _DBG_("Check: Theard mode is still unprivileged! ERROR...");
00253                 while(1); //Error loop
00254         }
00255         _DBG_("Demo terminate!");
00256         while (1);
00257         return 0;
00258 }
00259 
00260 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00261  allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00262  heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00263  toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00264  file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00265 int main(void) {
00266         return c_entry();
00267 }

00276  *******************************************************************************/

00278         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00279          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00280 
00281         /* Infinite loop */
00282         while (1)
00283                 ;
00284 }
